title: Destiny Rising RPG Announced, Takes Place In An Alternate Timeline In The Destiny Universe
description: NetEase and Bungie have announced an all-new Destiny mobile game called Destiny Rising. The sci-fi RPG is set in an "alternate timeline" in the Destiny universe, featuring what NetEase described as "best-in-class" shooting action on mobile.The game promises a "brand-new adventure with familiar and new characters," along with "an abundance of classic and brand-new modes." A closed alpha test will begin in November--you can pre-register now. Check out the announcement trailer below, while a more in-depth developer preview video below can be seen further down the page. Check out the developer preview trailer below to hear directly from the developers about what makes Destiny Rising unique in a crowded market for mobile games.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Xbox Partner Showcase Announced For October 17, "World Premieres" Promised; How To Watch Live
description: Microsoft has announced the next Xbox Partner Preview showcase, and it's coming very soon. The event is set to take place on Thursday, October 17, featuring "new and upcoming games" from outside teams like Remedy, Sega, and 505, among others. In short, Microsoft is promising "over a dozen" new trailers throughout the 25-minute show.This is an "no fluff, all games" broadcast, Microsoft said. Here's everything we know about the event and how to watch.How to watch the October Xbox Partner PreviewThe Xbox Partner Preview takes place Thursday, October 17 at 10 AM PT / 1 PM ET. The event will stream live in all the usual places, including the Xbox YouTube and Twitch channels.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Destiny: Rising Announced For Mobile, From Developers Of Diablo Immortal
description: Rumored to have been in development for years in or around an increasingly fractured Bungie, Destiny: Rising has been a poorly kept secret for the last couple of months. But now it’s official, with NetEase announcing the mobile game today, and the first close alpha beginning next month.Read more...

title: Amazon knocks $650 off the Samsung 49" Odyssey G9 OLED curved gaming monitor
description: Looking for a new gaming monitor? I don’t mean to tempt you, but this is one hell of a deal. Beating its most recent Black Friday pricing ($1179) by over $200, the Samsung 49" Odyssey G93SC Series OLED Curved Gaming Monitor is now down to $949 at Amazon. That’s $650 off its original list price, and one of the best deals of the year so far. Read more
author: Robert Anderson

title: The most obnoxious shooter you vaguely remember has returned in 420BlazeIt 2
description: Cast your mind back ten years. Done? Good, you survived the hideous form of time travel known as long-term memory. Now, do you see a horrendous first-person shooter anywhere back there, full of memes and intentionally terrible font choices? Congratulations, you may have remembered 420BlazeIt, a freakish eyesore of a game developed during a 7-day game jam by one of the people behind Crossy Road, of all things. It briefly did the YouTuber rounds, back when YouTube was not yet the anxiety-inducing ad factory it is today. Now I'm going to ask you to come back to the present. But prepare for a bit of a shock - there's a sequel coming to that bong huffing shooter. 420BlazeIt 2 has been announced for some months, but now there's a demo you can play too. Read more
author: Brendan Caldwell

title: Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 1!
description: I’m challenging myself to wear lip color everyday this week! I got started a little early yesterday with a MAC liquid lipstick called A Little Tamed. Do you want to join me? I’m setting the bar pretty low and giving myself the option of wearing the same color a few times, but I’m hoping that I’ll feel motivated to do a new color every day. Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen The post Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 1! appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 852
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Something nice someone did for you recently? My friend took me out to tea yesterday. I don’t know what it is about those tiny little sandwiches and a hot pot of earl grey, but it does a lot for my soul. 2. What’s your favorite holiday? Halloween because it’s fun, you get to dress up and it doesn’t involve getting gifts or orchestrating a big meal! 3. Something that makes you nervous? Driving next to big semi-trucks on the freeway that are going waaaaaay too fast. 4. My favorite weekday lunch is? Roasted red pepper pasta with garbanzo beans and basil topped with lots of parmesan cheese. YUM! 5. Something you accomplished over the weekend? I made myself take some downtime and did absolutely nothing housework related.[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 852 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen
